publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1136 Mr Jim Wallace: Regulation of Investigatory Powers (Scotland) Bill-That the Parliament agrees that the Regulation of Investigatory Powers (Scotland) Bill be passed. Supported by: Angus MacKay*

S1M-1136 Mr Jim Wallace: Regulation of Investigatory Powers (Scotland) Bill-That the Parliament agrees that the Regulation of Investigatory Powers (Scotland) Bill be passed. Supported by: Angus MacKay
